alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 6:51PM CST until March 17 at 7:42AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .The Wabash River at New Harmony has risen above flood stage, and will continue to rise to a crest of 17.9 feet next Monday, March 13. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY, MARCH 17... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Friday, March 17. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Harmonie State Park is closed. Surrounding bottomland is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.9 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday, March 17. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
